title: Master Services Agreement – Flat Rate
summary: This Master Services Agreement outlines the terms and conditions for clients accessing and using FlexPay™ Services. It details the obligations of FlexPay (FP) in providing electronic commerce services, including risk and profitability analysis and transaction management, as specified in an Order Form and Documentation.
key_points: Governs client's access to and use of FlexPay™ Services.
FlexPay provides electronic commerce services including risk and profitability analysis and transaction management.
Agreement is legally binding upon acceptance, either via an Order Form or by clicking acceptance.
Client must have the authority to bind their entity to the agreement.
Details FP's obligations to provide services as outlined in Order Forms and Documentation.
